name: Emergency Protocol (SereneYeti, Perayepat)
description: This is our game jam game for the GameDev.tv game jam with the theme - Death is Only the Beginning. Robotkind has become such an advanced civilization that they created organic life called the Fleshies. The Fleshies have dominated robotkind and robots everywhere are now in hiding. This caused an emergency protocol to activate and caused a special kind of robot to wake up. Unconstrained by death use your cores to live through death or change forms and solve the security puzzles guarding the factories that are the key to robotkind reproduction.
